TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DispatcherFrame extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示 中的执行循环。

span.span: Represents an execution loop in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象通常分为两类： objects typically fall into two categories: - 退出仅指示时的长时间运行、 常规用途帧。Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to. 在要求时，应退出这些帧。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行的非常具体的帧重要条件满足时该退出。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 这些帧可能会考虑不在要求退出正在等待其退出条件得以满足时退出。These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些框架应具有与之关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 不能使用在该托管的类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来获取类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool exitWhenRequested) cil managed

param.name: exitWhenRequested
param.span: 指示在要求退出所有帧时是否将退出此帧。

span.span: Indicates whether this frame will exit when all frames are requested to exit.

summary.span: 使用指定的退出请求标志初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified exit request flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常分为两类： typically fall into two categories: - 长时间运行、 常规用途的帧，仅指示时退出。Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to. 在要求时，应退出这些帧。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行的非常具体的帧重要条件满足时该退出。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 可以考虑这些帧，在要求退出正在等待其退出条件得以满足时并不退出。These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些框架应具有与之关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. 应用程序关闭时要求所有帧退出。At application shutdown, all frames are requested to exit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

value.span: 如果此帧应该继续，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查询在每个调度程序循环的顶部。 is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop. 在应用程序关闭所有帧都都请求退出。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 此类的成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来获取类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]
